titleStmt.title: Frank L. Wolford to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG11587

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p:
Head Quarters 1st Div Cav Corps
Blains Cross.Tenn.
December 21st 1863.
Gov Bramlette
Sir

I have the honor to recommend to you for promotion, to fill the existing vacancies in Company "K" 1st Ky Cav. 2nd Lieut Phillip Roberts to be made 1st Lieut and orderly Sergt Tilford ^N.^ Bruner to be made 2nd Lieut. Both in Company "K" 1st Ky Cav.

I am very resptly
Your obt Servt
Frank Wolford
Col of 1st Ky Cav

2 Lieut Phillip Roberts Coy K. com 1 Lieut same Coy. 1 Cavy Decr 21. 1863 vice A. J. Alexander promo.
1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8

Serg Tilford N. Bruner com 2 Lieut Coy K. 1 Cavy. Decr 21. 1863 vice Philip Roberts pro
1. 2. 3. 3. 4. 5. 6.

1 Cavy
Lts Roberts & Lt. Bruner
Com issd & forwd Jany 13. 1864
Resig: of Alexander not yet received :
